definitions.definition: Somebody employed to operate the signals and points of a railway .
A member of the armed forces responsible for signalling.
Somebody employed to direct rigging or crane operations by providing a different point of view .

main_definition: Somebody employed to operate the signals and points of a railway .
secondary_definitions: A member of the armed forces responsible for signalling.
Somebody employed to direct rigging or crane operations by providing a different point of view .
